sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_csm_mobile.CSMMobileUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Helper script for Customer Service mobile application</description>
        <name>CSMMobileUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSMMobileUtil = Class.create();
CSMMobileUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		
		this.CLIENT_TYPE = "Agent";
		
		//sys_sg_form_screen ids for each agent screen
		this.screenIDs = {
			NEEDS_ATTENTION_CASES : '313ba17f736033009234c346c4f6a7a7',
			ACTIVE_CASES : 'b33b257f736033009234c346c4f6a700',
			ACTIVE_CRITICAL_CASES : 'e54b657f736033009234c346c4f6a7ca',
			NEW_CASES : '4c4b257f736033009234c346c4f6a739',
			ESCALATION_APPROVAL :'7eb05e27733600104f78ebb3c4f6a789',
			CHANGE_APPROVAL : '32c2b64573a300104f78ebb3c4f6a792'
		};
		this.escalationSeverity ={
			highSeverity : '3fd67373b3500300ff6e6e5f26a8dcd4',
			mediumSeverity : '7de67373b3500300ff6e6e5f26a8dcc9'
		};
		this.groups ={
			'CAB Approval':'b85d44954a3623120004689b2d5dd60a'
		};

		//state values in sn_customerservice_case table
		this.caseStates = {
			NEW : 1,
			OPEN: 10,
			AWAITING_INFO : 18,
			RESOLVED : 6,
			CLOSED : 3,
			CANCELLED : 7
		};

		//priority values in sn_customerservice_case table
		this.casePriority = {
			CRITICAL : 1,
			HIGH : 2,
			MODERATE : 3,
			LOW : 4
		};
		
		this.escalationSeverity = {
			'Value':'3fd67373b3500300ff6e6e5f26a8dcd4',
			'DisplayValue':'High Severity'
		};
		
		this.escalationTemplate = {
			'Value':'08cdf0ca87500300fe4433d4c6cb0b89',
			'DisplayValue':'Standard Case Escalation'
		};

    },
	
	getDefaultValue: function(field){
		if(field=="escalation_severity")
			return this.escalationSeverity;
		if(field=="escalation_template")
			return this.escalationTemplate;
		return "";
    },

	getScreenId: function(caseGr){
		if(!caseGr.isValid()){
			gs.error('CSMMobileUtil -- invalid glide record :' +caseGr.sys_id);
			return;
		}


		var needs_attention = caseGr.needs_attention;
		var state = parseInt(caseGr.state,10);
		var priority = caseGr.priority;
		//if the case is in needs attention category bypass the state value
		if(needs_attention)
			return this.screenIDs.NEEDS_ATTENTION_CASES;

		switch(state){
			case this.caseStates.NEW:
				return this.screenIDs.NEW_CASES;

			case this.caseStates.OPEN:
			case this.caseStates.AWAITING_INFO:
			case this.caseStates.RESOLVED:
				if(priority == this.casePriority.CRITICAL)
					return this.screenIDs.ACTIVE_CRITICAL_CASES;
				else
					return this.screenIDs.ACTIVE_CASES;
		}



	},
    type: 'CSMMobileUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-01-31 09:26:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>03a6949e731323009234c346c4f6a7c1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CSMMobileUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Mobile" source="sn_csm_mobile">c87a2143dbb1e3005074163705961996</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service Mobile">c87a2143dbb1e3005074163705961996</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_03a6949e731323009234c346c4f6a7c1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-30 07:44:59</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
